attributes.background:
There is only one planet. The UK needs to put more thought and money into stopping global warming before it gets to late.

This should be the main issue that the UK should be battling, as its our future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
